summary: This is a brief email exchange among US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel regarding scheduling a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein for Monday at noon. It indicates internal coordination within the prosecution team.

persons.name: Neal
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of an email about scheduling an Epstein-related meeting.

events.title: Scheduled Epstein meeting with brass
events.description: A meeting was scheduled for Monday at noon involving US Attorney's Office personnel to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Internal US Attorney's Office (SDNY) email discussing scheduling a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting was proposed for Monday, April 8, 2019, at noon.
The email indicates ongoing coordination within the prosecution team handling the Epstein case in early April 2019.
